user_request: I need to create an audio file of a voiceover for a given online article, and add it to my example.mp4 video. The URL of the article is https://example-article.com
task_steps: Step 1: Use Text Downloader to download the text content from the given URL.
Step 2: Use Text-to-Speech tool to generate an audio file of the voiceover from the downloaded text.
Step 3: Use Video Synchronization to synchronize the timing of the generated voiceover with the visuals of the example.mp4 video.
Step 4: Use Video Editor to add the synchronized voiceover to the example.mp4 video.

arguments: The text content generated from the Text Downloader

user_request: I have an audio file at 'http://example-url/audio-example.wav' that contains some speech. I need to simplify the speech content and add it as a voiceover to my video 'example.mp4'. And then transcribe the speech from the video with added voiceover back into text so I can extract any URLs mentioned in it.
task_steps: Step 1: Use Audio-to-Text to transcribe the speech from 'example.mp4' with added voiceover.
Step 2: Use Text Extractor to extract URLs from the transcribed text.
Step 3: Use Text Simplifier to simplify the speech content from the original audio file.
Step 4: Use Text-to-Voice to generate a voiceover from the simplified speech content.
Step 5: Use Video Editor to add the generated voiceover to 'example.mp4'

user_request: I have a short summary about the benefits of exercise and I want it to be expanded then converted into a unique, different version. Lastly, I need the resulting article to be simplified for easier understanding. The provided short text is: 'Exercise helps improving mental and physical health.'
task_steps: Step 1: Use Text Expander to expand the given short text.
Step 2: Use Text Paraphraser to rewrite the expanded text using different words while maintaining its original meaning.
Step 3: Use Text Simplifier to rewrite the paraphrased text in a simpler and more understandable manner.

arguments.name: input_text
arguments.value: Exercise helps improving mental and physical health.

user_request: I would like to have the article from 'https://www.example.com/article' summarized and converted into an audio format with a soothing reverb effect. Additionally, please generate a waveform image from the resulting audio.

Step 2: Use Text-to-Audio tool with the 'soothing reverb effect' option to generate an audio file.
Step 3: Use Audio-to-Image tool to generate a waveform image from the audio file.

user_request: I have a short text: 'Grt mtg 2day!' and an audio file: 'example.wav'. I'd like to expand the text, analyze its sentiment, and modify the audio file's voice based on the sentiment.
task_steps: Step 1: Use Text Expander to expand the given short text.
Step 2: Use Text Sentiment Analysis to analyze the sentiment of the expanded text.
Step 3: Based on the sentiment analysis result, use Voice Changer to modify the voice of the audio file.

user_request: I have a URL with an image that contains some text. I want to download the image, extract the text from it, search for that text on the internet, and finally search for related videos.

Step 2: Use Image-to-Text to extract text from the downloaded image.

user_request: I have a shaky video 'example.mp4' which contains an important speech that I want to turn into text. Please stabilize the video, extract the audio from the stabilized video and transcribe the speech into text.

Step 2: Use Video-to-Audio to extract the audio track from the stabilized video.
Step 3: Use Audio-to-Text to transcribe the speech from the extracted audio.

user_request: I have this video file 'example.mp4', and I want to change its playback speed. Please slow it down by 50%. Next, I want you to extract the audio from the slowed-down video and transcribe it into text. Please then correct any grammatical errors in the transcribed text and paraphrase it. Finally, search for related videos based on the paraphrased text.
task_steps: Step 1: Use Video Speed Changer to slow down the video by 50%.
Step 2: Use Video-to-Audio to extract the audio from the slowed-down video.
Step 3: Use Audio-to-Text to transcribe the extracted audio into text.
Step 4: Use Text Grammar Checker to correct any grammatical errors in the transcribed text.
Step 5: Use Text Paraphraser to paraphrase the corrected text.
Step 6: Use Video Search to find related videos based on the paraphrased text.

user_request: I have a lecture video 'example.mp4' and the accompanying text file of notes. Please create a summarized version of the notes, extract important keywords, and then adjust the speed of the video based on those keywords.

Step 2: Use Keyword Extractor to extract important keywords and phrases from the summarized text.
Step 3: Use Video Speed Changer to adjust the playback speed of the video based on the extracted keywords.

user_request: I want to create a unique and visually appealing image that represents the audio file example.wav along with a style inspired by example.jpg. user_request: I have an article about the history of the internet that I want to create a unique and summarized version of. After that, I'd like to turn the summarized text into a video. The initial article is: 'The Internet, a global network of computers, has been constantly evolving since its inception in the late 1960s. Initial ARPANET has evolved into a much larger and more complex system as newer technologies emerged. In the early days, it was a strictly academic and military resource, before becoming the globally influential platform it is today. Rapid technological advancements in networking and software development have transformed the Internet, making it an indispensable tool for research, communication, and entertainment.'
task_steps: Step 1: Use Text Summarizer to summarize the given article.
Step 2: Use Text Paraphraser to rewrite the summarized text in a unique way.
Step 3: Use Text-to-Video to generate a video from the unique and summarized text.

arguments.name: article
arguments.value: The Internet, a global network of computers, has been constantly evolving since its inception in the late 1960s. Initial ARPANET has evolved into a much larger and more complex system as newer technologies emerged. In the early days, it was a strictly academic and military resource, before becoming the globally influential platform it is today. Rapid technological advancements in networking and software development have transformed the Internet, making it an indispensable tool for research, communication, and entertainment.
